meanings.sent1: The pest control company was extermining the ants in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was extermining the weeds from his garden.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was extermining all evil from the city.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight was like a powerful force extermining the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The vacuum cleaner was extermining the dust bunnies under the bed.

meanings.sent1: The demolition crew was extermining the old building to make space for a new one.
meanings.sent2: The hurricane was extermining everything in its path.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's tantrum seemed to be extermining the peace and quiet in the house.
meanings.sent4: The wildfire was like a raging beast extermining the forest.
meanings.sent5: The flood was extermining the crops in the fields.

meanings.definition: The act of killing or destroying something completely
meanings.sent1: The extermining of the pests was successful thanks to the professional pest control service.
meanings.sent2: The extermining of the virus required a strong medication.
meanings.sent3: The extermining of the competition in the market was fierce.
meanings.sent4: The extermining of the old traditions was met with resistance.
meanings.sent5: The extermining of the enemy troops was a strategic move in the war.
